sqlMap.select: select a.menu_id "id", menu_pid "pid", menu_name "text", b.menu_id "id2", c.menu_id "id3" from sc_menu a left join (select distinct (m.menu_id) from sc_menu m, role_user_rela a, role_menu_rela b where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.menu_id = m.menu_id and a.user_id = #userId#) b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id left join (select r.menu_id from user_menu_rela r where r.user_id = #userId#) c on a.menu_id = c.menu_id order by a.menu_order, a.menu_id
sqlMap.delete: delete from role_user_rela where role_id = #rid# and user_id = #userId#

select aa.id "id", aa.name "name", aa.pid "pid", aa.tp "tp", aa.ord "ord", b.data_id "seldata", c.data_id "seldata2" from ( select ds_id id, name name, pid, 'fl' as tp, ord from olap_subject_type where company_id = #siteId# union all select tid+100000, tdesc, type_id, 'data' as tp, tid as "ord" from olap_table_meta where company_id = #siteId# ) aa left join ( select r.role_id, r.data_id from role_data_rela r, role_user_rela u where r.role_id =u.role_id and u.user_id = #userId# ) b on aa.id - 100000 = b.data_id left join ( select r.data_id from user_data_rela r where r.user_id = #userId# ) c on aa.id - 100000 = c.data_id order by "tp", "ord"
